name: Deadwood Forest
description:
A super simple "puzzle" game where you avoid trap tiles while you attempt to reach the end goal through 20 levels. Trial and error awaits you. This game will test your memory skills. Playing while exhausted is not recommended....or drink some coffee :P

Controls
Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
Quit: Esc
If you're feeling hip, this game has controller support (Xbox and Playstation).

Follow Me

Amateur indie dev making small games with Unity while I learn C#. If you want to see my progress on everything I am working on you can follow me on these platforms. If you do want to follow me, or just want to say hi, I highly suggest you follow me over on Twitter as that is the platform that I use every day.
